title: Rent to Own in Ferndale. 2 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: ['Absolutely adorable home within walking distance of downtown Ferndale available for lease!', 'Updated kitchen, beautiful hardwood flooring, and a fully fenced yard with shed!', 'Convenient location near all of the amenities one could ask for!', 'Pets allowed with restrictions and non-refundable fee ($250).', 'Security deposit is 1.5 months rent.', '12 month lease minimum, discount for 24 month lease.', 'Must submit credit check with application.', 'Occupancy shall begin on 9/9.', '***Please Text LORI', 'to', 'show contact info', 'For More Details & Pics Of This Property***', 'Brought to you by Lori Anderson at RE/MAX Classic - Farmington Hills']
